      • getEMVKernelNameVersion

        public java.util.Map getEMVKernelNameVersion()
        Get the version information of EMV kernels, including EMV, PayPass, payWave, ExpressPay, J/Speedy, D-PAS/ZIP, qUICS, and so on. The results are stored in the Map structure.
        Returns:
        Kernel name version list

      • getSystemModulesVersion

        public java.util.Map getSystemModulesVersion()
        Get the Module version information, including version information covered in TQM and PCI authentication but not returned by other APIs, such as PCD version.
        Returns:
        A Map structure that contains various Module versions.

      • setNfcFieldIntensity

        public int setNfcFieldIntensity(int mode,
                                int flag)
        This method is to set the strength of the contactless card reader
        Parameters:
        mode - 1:EMV mode. 2:Default mode (The field strength in this mode is lower than the EMV mode).
        flag - 1: Permanently effective, the setting will still take effect after power-on again. 2: Temporarily effective, after setting, power on again to restore the default setting field strength.
        Returns:
        0: Success; Other values: Error code.

      • getRunningStatus

        public int getRunningStatus()
        Get the running status.
        Returns:
        RunningStatus_Ready = 0; RunningStatus_InTransaction = 1; RunningStatus_Printing = 2; RunningStatus_Update = 3;

      • controlDebugLog

        public int controlDebugLog(int flag)

      • setPowerControl

        public int setPowerControl(int deviceType,
                           int state)
        This is the external device power control switch interface
        Parameters:
        deviceType - 0:All power sources. 1:LAN Power Supply. 2:XEC360 Power Supply. 3:Money box v6 Power Supply. 4:Money box v9 Power Supply. 5:Money box v12 Power Supply. 6:RJ11_1 Power Supply.
        state - 0: Turn off the power 1: Turn on the power
        Returns:
        0: Success; Other values: Error code.
